question: Show animation films and comedy films released in 2021.
sql_query1:
SELECT Films.Title 
FROM Films
WHERE (Films.Genre = "Animation" OR Films.Genre = "Comedy") AND Films.Release_Year = 2021
sql_query2:
SELECT Films.Title 
FROM Films
WHERE Films.Genre = "Animation" OR Films.Genre = "Comedy" AND Films.Release_Year = 2021
interpretation1: What animation films were released in 2021 and what comedies were released in the same year?
interpretation2: List all animation films and also list comedies that were released in 2021.
